function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 in hospital and community wastewater collection sites","Impact":"Contamination of community sewage lines","Mitigation":"Proper wastewater management with sanitization and treatment","Technologies":"Advanced water treatment technologies, ultraviolet disinfection, chlorination","People":"Community members, healthcare workers","Owner":"Local municipalities, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Variability of home quarantine experience based on home conditions","Impact":"Different levels of comfort and well-being during lockdown","Mitigation":"Improvement of household living conditions, provision of proper ventilation, sanitation facilities, and privacy","Technologies":"Home improvement technologies, sanitation technologies","People":"Households, individuals in quarantine","Owner":"Local government, homeowners"},{"Description":"Crowded housing leading to lack of privacy and inadequate sanitation facilities","Impact":"Complicates virus isolation, negates social distancing measures, worsens comfort during lockdowns","Mitigation":"Provision of separate sanitation facilities, improvement of housing infrastructure","Technologies":"Sanitation technologies, housing infrastructure technologies","People":"Crowded households, individuals in quarantine","Owner":"Local government, housing authorities"}]}
